channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Wolfs’ sequel canceled because director ‘no longer trusted’ Apple

item.title: Nike Promo Code: Extra 30% Off Select Styles
item.description: Check out our deals for Nike this month, including up to 60% off with our coupon code.

item.title: Sonos Arc Ultra Soundbar Review: Big Bar, Better App
item.description: As long as your app works, the new premium Sonos soundbar is a marvel of acoustic engineering.

item.title: 14 Best Game Controllers (2024) for PC, Switch, PS5, and Xbox
item.description: A great gamepad instantly levels up your play. These are our top picks for Switch, Xbox, PlayStation, and PC.

item.title: How a digital “you” can sit through your agonizing web conference calls
